author: Katie Shepherd
title: ‘He just got better and better’: 104-year-old veteran beats coronavirus in time to celebrate his birthday - Washington Post
description: ‘He just got better and better’: 104-year-old veteran beats coronavirus in time to celebrate his birthday Washington Post Oregon Spanish flu survivor and WWII vet, aged 104, becomes world's oldest person to beat Covid-19 Daily Mail Oregon veteran, 104, could …
content: In early March, Lapschies and a small group of elderly tenants living together in a state-run veterans facility in Lebanon, Ore., started feeling ill. They were among the first Oregon residents to test positive for coronavirus, and Lapschiess family worried t… [+4467 chars]
